MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-APR-2021 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L34 postcode area of Prescot affecting properties in Highlands and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.32am. Repairs to the underground cable are taking longer than expected and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.15am on April 24, 2021.
